Class Deck

java.lang.Object
  Deck

public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object

Simulate a deck of cards.

Constructor Summary
Deck()
          Create a Deck of 52 Card objects.
 
Method Summary
 Card deal()
          Deal the Deck's top Card object.
 boolean isEmpty()
          Return an indicator of whether or not the Deck is empty.
 void putBack(Card card)
          Put back a Card at the bottom of the Deck.
 void shuffle()
          Shuffle the Deck.

Constructor Detail

Deck

public Deck()
Create a Deck of 52 Card objects. Shuffle these objects.

Method Detail

deal

public Card deal()
Deal the Deck's top Card object.

Returns:
the Card object at the top of the Deck

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
Return an indicator of whether or not the Deck is empty.

Returns:
true if the Deck contains no Card objects; otherwise, false

putBack

Put back a Card at the bottom of the Deck.

Parameters:

Shuffle the Deck.
